description: black pouch woven with multicolored vertical stripes; wide shoulder strap of same black striped fabric; black fabric embroidered section at top of strap--multicolored diamond with geometric motifs; strip of embroidery at top on each side--zigzag and Greek key designs; large predominately white, green, red and yellow pompons on bag and strap with very large pompon at front center
dimension:
12 1/4 x 13 1/2 in. (31.12 x 34.29 cm) (pouch only, without pompons)
39 in. (99.06 cm) (object part, strap length)
title: Man's shoulder bag
